data.title: Writing History in Medieval Poland: Bishop Vincentius of Cracow and the Chronica Polonorum 9782503569512, 9782503569529
data.meta_description: This volume presents an in-depth analysis of the Chronica Polonorum, one of the greatest works of the twelfth-century re...
